sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../style/tour-details.css'; import { Col, Container, Row, form, ListGroup, Form } from 'reactstrap'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import tourData from '../assets/data/tours'; import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRatings'; import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg'; const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const tour = tourData.find((tour) => tour.id === id); const { photo, title, desc, price, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize, address, } = tour; const { avgRating, totalRating } = calculateAvgRating(reviews); return ( <>

{title}

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( 'Not rated' ) : ( ({reviews?.length}) )} {address}
{city} ${price}/per person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

{reviews?.map((review) => (
Himel

{new Date('01-01-2023')}

))}
); }; export default TourDetails;
